name: votedine
description: VoteDine - The smartest way to decide where to eat with friends

scripts.dev:local: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev

author: VoteDine Team
